text: Bucheon College is a private technical college in Bucheon City, Gyeonggi province, South Korea. Although private, it has strong cooperative relationships with the Bucheon city government. The school employs about 90 instructors, and offers instruction in fields such as construction, electronics, and management. ==See also== *List of colleges and universities in South Korea *List of Korea-related topics *Education in South Korea ==External links== *Official school website, in Korean Category:Universities and colleges in Gyeonggi Province Category:1979 establishments in South Korea Category:Educational institutions established in 1979
title: Bucheon University
